::Grounded::
Grounded came to just when Windlord gave him the call..."Right.." he
mumbled as he staggered up and transformed. His left arm was in
tatters of scrap and his legs were even worse. Somehow he stood and
waited for Windlord.
--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Windlord:
>
> Windlord opened his comm link with Grounded "Hey Grounded, I'm pretty
> fast in air, be ready to go up my back when I landed, 'cause I'm
> planning take off and retreat... they could have some pals around and
> we could be in jaws..."
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> > Wildrider was to busy glotting at his hit, to see the barrage of
> bullets
> > coming. Every single one hit, sending him backward, and giving him
> some
> > nice smoking air conditioning (joke). He fell back, and hit his
> head.
> > "Ooooooh. Huhhh, right, there were to of them," and then after
> mumbling to
> > himself, stays down for a minute, breathing hard. One of the wounds
> had hit
> > his fuel tank, and he was dripping a bit of oil, staining the green
> grass
> > under him.
